changeSet.comment: Updating sample_list adding program_uuid corresponding to lists existing
changeSet.sql: UPDATE sample_list spl SET spl.program_uuid=(SELECT p.program_uuid FROM project p INNER JOIN nd_experiment_project exp on p.project_id = exp.project_id INNER JOIN nd_experiment ex on exp.nd_experiment_id = ex.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN plant pl on ex.nd_experiment_id = pl.nd_experiment_id INNER JOIN sample sp on sp.plant_id = pl.plant_id where sp.sample_list=spl.list_id group by sp.sample_list);
